channel.title: Fight Club on Weazel News RP
channel.description: Recent content in Fight Club on Weazel News RP

item.title: Fists of Fury
item.description: What do the citizens of Los Santos do when they have a beef with someone or they just want to prove their metal? It would seem that they attend the local Fight Club and duke it out in the ring. Weazel News was able to catch a fight recently and here is what we learned. When Weazel News arrived on sight it was already late into the session. There had been several fights already and we were about to witness the last bout of the evening.
